name: Máire O'Neill
content: Business Card | School of Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Computer Science | Queen's University Belfast Top Business Card Professor Maire O'Neill Director for the Centre of Secure Information Technologies (CSIT) E-mail: Phone: +44 (0)28 9097 1785 Fax: +44 (0)28 9097 1702 Research Profile: pure.qub.ac.uk/en/persons/maire-oneill Room: G/49Institute of Electronics, Communications and Information Technology,Titanic Quarter PostalAddress: The Institute of Electronics, Communications and Information Technology (ECIT) Queen’s University Belfast NI Science Park Queen’s Road Queen’s Island Belfast BT3 9DT Research Interests: High-speed Security Architectures Cryptography for Constrained Environments RFID authentication protocols Power Analysis and EM side channel attacks/countermeasures QCA Circuit design Research Clusters:   Centre for Secure Information Technologies (CSIT) School & University Responsibilities:   Acting ECIT Director Meet Our People © Queen's University Belfast 2024 Privacy and cookies Website accessibility Freedom of information Modern slavery statement Equality, Diversity and Inclusion University Policies and Procedures Information Privacy and cookies Website accessibility Freedom of information Modern slavery statement Equality, Diversity and Inclusion University Policies and Procedures © Queen's University Belfast 2024 Manage cookies
